casebody.data:
Charles W. Romeyn, respondent, v. Daniel E. Sickles, appellant. Decided October 5, 1885. Appeal from a judgment entered upon the report of a referee. Action to recover for services as architect in preparing plans, &c. Daniel P. Hays, for appellant. Theron G-. Strong, for respondent.

Before Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Opinion Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, upon the opinion delivered by the referee.
